resources.string: Before we start,here are things you should know:
- Please be honest when making your choice.
- We are just doing a research so you dont have to fake your information.
- Please follow the step we designed for you and dont skip any questions.
Which brand of phone will you choose if you are going to buy a new one?
How much does your phone cost?
What kind of phone are you using?
What functions does your phone have now?
What functions are the most often used
What function do you expect your phone to have in the future?
In which condition will you buy a new phone?
When the old phone has been used for a year or two.(But it still works)
When the old phone has been used for more than three years.*But it still works)
When the old phone breaks down.
When a new phone is released
Which brand of phone will you choose if you are going to buy a new one?
